name: Bacillus
description:
Bacillus
Bacillus is an adventure game in which you go on the journey
to find a host! Along the way, you'll have to overcome countless
obstacles, eat the weak,
and avoid the strong ones.




Merciless, sneaky and captivating


ten different stages with different levels.
End stage is an open world stage in the human body
"The dream of every bacillus".




Varied and challenging

various enemies such as simple bacillus,
mutated bacillus,
antiviruses,
defenses,
omnivorous parasites.


if you have a host, it will take time to develop!

Eat anything smaller than you to grow!
Eat certain mutant bacilli to mutate themselves and become stronger!
